featured.text: Once the pests detect the chemical fog in the room, they’ll hide themselves in walls or other hideaways, where you’ll never be able to treat them effectively.

other.text: When you use a bug bomb, a chemical mixture rains down on your counters, furniture, floors, and walls, leaving behind oily and toxic substances.

definition.zh_def: 牆壁，通常用於分隔空間或提供支持的結構。
definition.en_def: A vertical structure that defines and sometimes protects an area; it can be made of various materials.
definition.example: She hung a picture on the wall of her living room.
